thread.section_title: Mobility Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mobility Direct | www.mobilitydirect.ie
thread.title: Timothy Wu
thread.title_full: Mobility Direct reviewed by Timothy Wu

author: Timothy Wu
title: Timothy Wu
text: I highly recommend Mobility Direct. I am an American tourist and required a knee walker while on holiday in Dublin. After a few emails with which they provided quick replies, I had rented a quality knee walker for a very reasonable price. They also delivered and picked up the walker from my hotel making it quite easy on me! Thank you for providing this service!
